pages.title: Copper Ore
pages.text: Copper ore can be found between Y150 and Y20 in the overworld, or there is a chance it can spawn when using the Botania orechid

pages.title: Zinc ore
pages.text: Zinc ore can be found between Y135 and Y5 in the overworld, or there is a chance it can spawn when using the Botania orechid

pages.title: Redstone ore
pages.text: Redstone ore can be found between Y28 and Y4 in the overworld

pages.title: Lapis ore
pages.text: Lapis ore can be found between Y36 and Y12 in the overworld

pages.title: Emerald ore
pages.text: Emerald ore can be found between Y52 and Y12 in the overworld

pages.title: Coal ore
pages.text: Coal ore can be found between Y160 and Y1 in the overworld, or there is a chance it can spawn when using the Botania orechid

pages.title: Bitumen ore
pages.text: Bitumen ore can be found between Y160 and Y40 in the overworld

pages.title: Apatite ore
pages.text: Apatite ore can be found between Y128 and Y64 in the overworld
